column12: Title
column13: Abstract

column12: DRY-TYPE VACUUM PUMP AND PUMPING INSTALLATION
column13: The present invention relates to a dry-type vacuum pump (1) comprising an ancillary stator (13) at least traversed by one of the shafts (4); - a suction pipe (14) provided with a controllable inlet valve (15), connecting an inlet (17) of the ancillary stator (13) to a pumping stage (3f) communicating with the discharge portion (8) of the vacuum pump (1); and - at least one ancillary rotor (16) supported by said shaft (4), said ancillary rotor (16) being configured so that the rotation thereof in the ancillary stator (13) causes a gas to be pumped between the inlet (17) and an outlet (18) of the ancillary stator (13) in order to lower the pressure in the pumping stage (3f) when the controllable inlet valve (15) is commanded to open. The invention also relates to a pumping installation comprising an airlock connected to a vacuum pump (1).

column12: Pompe à vide de type sèche et installation de pompage
column13: La présente invention concerne une pompe à vide (1) de type sèche comportant un stator annexe (13) traversé au moins par un des arbres (4), - une canalisation d’aspiration (14) munie d’une vanne d’entrée pilotable (15), reliant une entrée (17) du stator annexe (13) à un étage de pompage (3f) communiquant avec le refoulement (8) de la pompe à vide (1), et - au moins un rotor annexe (16) porté par ledit arbre (4), ledit rotor annexe (16) étant configuré pour que sa rotation dans le stator annexe (13) entraine un gaz à pomper entre l’entrée (17) et une sortie (18) du stator annexe (13) pour abaisser la pression dans l’étage de pompage (3f) lorsque la vanne d’entrée pilotable (15) est commandée en ouverture. L’invention se rapporte également à une installation de pompage comportant un sas relié à une pompe à vide (1).Figure à publier avec l’abrégé : Fig. 2

column12: Dry type vacuum pump and pumping installation
column13: The present invention concerns a dry type vacuum pump (1) including an auxiliary stator (13) through which at least one of the shafts (4) passes, - an inlet passage (14) provided with a controllable inlet valve (15), connecting an inlet (17) of the auxiliary stator (13) to a pumping stage (3f) communicating with the outlet (8) of the vacuum pump (1), and - at least one auxiliary rotor (16) carried by said shaft (4), said auxiliary rotor (16) being configured so that its rotation in the auxiliary stator (13) drives a gas to be pumped between the inlet (17) and an outlet (18) of the auxiliary stator (13) to lower the pressure in the pumping stage (3f) when the controllable inlet valve (15) is commanded to open. The invention also relates to a pumping installation including a loadlock connected to a vacuum pump (1).

column12: Pompe à vide de type sèche et installation de pompage
column13: La présente invention concerne une pompe à vide (1) de type sèche comportant un stator annexe (13) traversé au moins par un des arbres (4), - une canalisation d’aspiration (14) munie d’une vanne d’entrée pilotable (15), reliant une entrée (17) du stator annexe (13) à un étage de pompage (3f) communiquant avec le refoulement (8) de la pompe à vide (1), et - au moins un rotor annexe (16) porté par ledit arbre (4), ledit rotor annexe (16) étant configuré pour que sa rotation dans le stator annexe (13) entraine un gaz à pomper entre l’entrée (17) et une sortie (18) du stator annexe (13) pour abaisser la pression dans l’étage de pompage (3f) lorsque la vanne d’entrée pilotable (15) est commandée en ouverture. L’invention se rapporte également à une installation de pompage comportant un sas relié à une pompe à vide (1).Figure à publier avec l’abrégé : Fig. 2

column12: Trockenvakuumpumpe und Pumpanlage
column13: Die vorliegende Erfindung betrifft eine Trockenvakuumpumpe (1), einen Zusatzstator (13) aufweisend, durch den sich mindestens eine der Wellen (4) erstreckt,- einen Einlasskanal (14), der mit einem steuerbaren Eingangsventil (15) versehen ist und einen Eingang (17) des Zusatzstators (13) mit einer Pumpstufe (3f) verbindet, die mit dem Ausgang (8) der Vakuumpumpe (1) in Verbindung steht, und- mindestens einen Zusatzrotor (16), der von der Welle (4) getragen wird, wobei der Zusatzrotor (16) so konfiguriert ist, dass seine Drehung in dem Zusatzstator (13) ein zu pumpendes Gas zwischen den Eingang (17) und einen Ausgang (18) des Zusatzstators (13) fördert, um den Druck in der Pumpstufe (3f) abzusenken, wenn das steuerbare Eingangsventil (15) zum Öffnen angesteuert wird.Die Erfindung betrifft auch eine Pumpanlage, die eine mit einer Vakuumpumpe (1) verbundene Ladeschleuse aufweist.

column12: DRY-TYPE VACUUM PUMP AND PUMPING INSTALLATION
column13: The present invention relates to a dry-type vacuum pump (1) comprising an ancillary stator (13) at least traversed by one of the shafts (4); a suction pipe (14) provided with a controllable inlet valve (15), connecting an inlet (17) of the ancillary stator (13) to a pumping stage (3f) communicating with the discharge portion (8) of the vacuum pump (1); and at least one ancillary rotor (16) supported by said shaft (4), said ancillary rotor (16) being configured so that the rotation thereof in the ancillary stator (13) causes a gas to be pumped between the inlet (17) and an outlet (18) of the ancillary stator (13) in order to lower the pressure in the pumping stage (3f) when the controllable inlet valve (15) is commanded to open. The invention also relates to a pumping installation comprising an airlock connected to a vacuum pump (1).

column12: Dispositif, procédé de surveillance de dépôts et pompe à vide
column13: Dispositif de surveillance (1) de dépôts dans un conduit de refoulement (9) caractérisé en ce qu’il comporte :- un capteur de pression (10) permettant de mesurer au moins une différence de pression dans le conduit de refoulement (9) entre une pression amont dans un emplacement amont (11) et une pression aval dans un emplacement aval (12) dans la direction de pompage des gaz (F), et - une unité de traitement (14) configurée pour déterminer la présence de dépôt entre les emplacements amont et aval (11, 12) en fonction de la comparaison de la différence de pression mesurée avec au moins un seuil prédéterminé. Figure d’abrégé : Figure 1

column12: DRY ROUGH VACUUM PUMP AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE INJECTION OF A PURGING GAS
column13: The invention relates to a dry rough vacuum pump (1) comprising an injection device (9) designed to distribute a purging gas in the pumping stages (2a-2e), the injection device (9) comprising: - a first pressure sensor (12) arranged on a common portion (15) of the distributor (10); - a second pressure sensor (13a-13e) arranged on each branch (16a-16e) of the distributor (10); and - a control unit (14) designed to generate a control signal by pulse width modulation to control the regulation valves (11a-11e) independently of each other as a function of the pressure measurement differences between the first pressure sensor (12) and the second pressure sensors (13a-13e).

column12: DRY-TYPE PRIMARY VACUUM PUMP AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE INJECTION OF A PURGING GAS
column13: A dry-type primary vacuum pump includes an injection device to distribute a purging gas in the pumping stages. The injection device includes: a first pressure sensor arranged on a common portion of the distributor, a second pressure sensor arranged on each branch of the distributor, and a control unit to generate a pulse width modulation command signal for the control of the regulation valves independently of one another as a function of the pressure measurement differences between the first pressure sensor and the second pressure sensors.

column12: Pompe à vide primaire de type sèche et procédé de contrôle de l’injection d’un gaz de purge
column13: L’invention concerne une pompe à vide (1) primaire de type sèche comportant un dispositif d’injection (9) configuré pour distribuer un gaz de purge dans les étages de pompage (2a-2e), le dispositif d’injection (9) comportant :o un premier capteur de pression (12) agencé sur une portion commune (15) du distributeur (10),o un deuxième capteur de pression (13a-13e) agencé sur chaque branche (16a-16e) du distributeur (10), et o une unité de contrôle (14) configurée pour générer un signal de commande par modulation de largeur d’impulsions pour le contrôle des vannes de régulation (11a-11e) indépendamment les unes des autres en fonction des différences de mesure de pression entre le premier capteur de pression (12) et les deuxièmes capteurs de pression (13a-13e). Figure pour l’abrégé : Fig. 1

column12: 건식 1차 진공 펌프 및 퍼징 가스의 주입을 제어하기 위한 방법
column13: 본 발명은 펌핑 스테이지(pumping stage)(2a-2e)에서 퍼징 가스(purging gas)를 분배하도록 설계된 주입 장치(9)를 포함하는 건식 1차 진공 펌프(1)에 관한 것으로서, 주입 장치(9)는: - 분배기(10)의 공통 부분(15)에 배열된 제1 압력 센서(12); - 분배기(10)의 각 분기부(16a-16e)에 배열된 제2 압력 센서(13a-13e); 및 - 제1 압력 센서(12)와 제2 압력 센서(13a-13e) 사이의 압력 측정값 차이의 함수로서 서로 독립적으로 조절 밸브(11a-11e)를 제어하기 위한 펄스 폭 변조 명령 신호를 생성하도록 설계된 제어 유닛(14)을 포함한다.

column12: Dry-type primary vacuum pump and method for controlling the injection of a purging gas
column13: A dry-type primary vacuum pump includes an injection device to distribute a purging gas in the pumping stages. The injection device includes: a first pressure sensor arranged on a common portion of the distributor, a second pressure sensor arranged on each branch of the distributor, and a control unit to generate a pulse width modulation command signal for the control of the regulation valves independently of one another as a function of the pressure measurement differences between the first pressure sensor and the second pressure sensors.
column32: International Search Report dated Jun. 25, 2020 in PCT/EP2020/063590 filed May 15, 2020, 2 pages.

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE TEMPERATURE OF A VACUUM PUMP, AND ASSOCIATED VACUUM PUMP AND INSTALLATION
column13: The invention relates to a method for controlling the temperature of a vacuum pump (2) of the dry type subjected to variable pumping loads, in which the temperature of the vacuum pump (2) is controlled by means of at least one cooling element (11a, 11b) coupled to the stator (5) according to a temperature setpoint and a measurement of the temperature of the stator (5), characterized in that the value of a parameter indicative of the pumping load and chosen from a current or a power drawn by the vacuum pump (2) is monitored to determine whether it is below a load threshold and, if the value of the parameter indicative of the pumping load is below the load threshold then the temperature setpoint is increased. The invention also relates to a vacuum pump of the dry type and to an installation.

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE TEMPERATURE OF A VACUUM PUMP, AND ASSOCIATED VACUUM PUMP AND INSTALLATION
column13: A method is provided for controlling a temperature of a vacuum pump of a dry vacuum pump type subjected to variable pumping loads, the pump including a stator, a pumping stage, two shafts extending into the stage and respectively bearing a rotor to rotate synchronously in opposite directions in the stator and to drive a gas from a suction inlet to a delivery outlet, a cooling element coupled to the stator, a temperature sensor to measure a stator temperature, and a controller to control the stator temperature by the cooling element and the temperature sensor; and the method including controlling the pump temperature by the cooling element based on a temperature setpoint and a measurement of the stator temperature, and monitoring whether a value of a pumping load parameter is below a load threshold and, if so, increasing the setpoint. A vacuum pump and a system are also provided.

column12: Method for controlling the temperature of a vacuum pump, and associated vacuum pump and installation
PROCEDE DE CONTROLE DE LA TEMPERATURE D’UNE POMPE A VIDE, POMPE A VIDE ET INSTALLATION ASSOCIEES
column13: L'invention concerne un procédé de contrôle de la température d'une pompe à vide (2) de type sèche soumise à des charges de pompage variables, dans lequel on contrôle la température de la pompe à vide (2) au moyen d'au moins un élément refroidisseur (11a, 11b) couplé au stator (5) en fonction d'une consigne de température et d'une mesure de la température du stator (5), caractérisé en ce qu'on surveille si la valeur d'un paramètre représentatif de la charge de pompage choisi parmi un courant consommé ou une puissance consommée par la pompe à vide (2) est inférieure à un seuil de charge et, si la valeur du paramètre représentatif de la charge de pompage est inférieure au seuil de charge alors on augmente la consigne de température. L'invention concerne également une pompe à vide de type sèche et une installation.

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE TEMPERATURE OF A VACUUM PUMP, AND ASSOCIATED VACUUM PUMP AND INSTALLATION
Trockenvorvakuumpumpe und Verfahren zur Steuerung der Einleitung eines Spülgases
column13: Die Erfindung betrifft eine Trockenvorvakuumpumpe (1) mit einer Einleitungsvorrichtung (9), die dazu konfiguriert ist, ein Spülgas in den Pumpstufen (2a-2e) zu verteilen, wobei die Einleitungsvorrichtung (9) Folgendes umfasst: - einen ersten Drucksensor (12), der an einem gemeinsamen Abschnitt (15) des Verteilers (10) angeordnet ist, - einen zweiten Drucksensor (13a-13e), der an jedem Zweig (16a-16e) des Verteilers (10) angeordnet ist, und - eine Steuereinheit (14), die dazu konfiguriert ist, ein Steuersignal mit Impulsbreitenmodulation für die Steuerung der Regulierungsventile (11a-11e) unabhängig voneinander als Funktion der Druckmessdifferenzen zwischen dem ersten Drucksensor (12) und den zweiten Drucksensoren (13a-13e) zu erzeugen.

column12: DRY ROUGH VACUUM PUMP AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE INJECTION OF A PURGING GAS
column13: The invention relates to a dry rough vacuum pump (1) comprising an injection device (9) designed to distribute a purging gas in the pumping stages (2a-2e), the injection device (9) comprising: - a first pressure sensor (12) arranged on a common portion (15) of the distributor (10); - a second pressure sensor (13a-13e) arranged on each branch (16a-16e) of the distributor (10); and - a control unit (14) designed to generate a control signal by pulse width modulation to control the regulation valves (11a-11e) independently of each other as a function of the pressure measurement differences between the first pressure sensor (12) and the second pressure sensors (13a-13e).

column12: Pompe à vide primaire de type sèche et procédé de contrôle de l’injection d’un gaz de purge
column13: L’invention concerne une pompe à vide (1) primaire de type sèche comportant un dispositif d’injection (9) configuré pour distribuer un gaz de purge dans les étages de pompage (2a-2e), le dispositif d’injection (9) comportant :o un premier capteur de pression (12) agencé sur une portion commune (15) du distributeur (10),o un deuxième capteur de pression (13a-13e) agencé sur chaque branche (16a-16e) du distributeur (10), et o une unité de contrôle (14) configurée pour générer un signal de commande par modulation de largeur d’impulsions pour le contrôle des vannes de régulation (11a-11e) indépendamment les unes des autres en fonction des différences de mesure de pression entre le premier capteur de pression (12) et les deuxièmes capteurs de pression (13a-13e). Figure pour l’abrégé : Fig. 1

column12: 진공 펌프의 온도를 제어하는 방법, 및 관련 진공 펌프 및 설비
column13: 본 발명은, 가변 펌핑 부하들을 겪는 건식 진공 펌프 형식의 진공 펌프(2)의 온도를 제어하는 방법에 관한 것으로, 그 진공 펌프(2)의 온도를 고정자(5)의 온도 측정치 및 온도 설정치에 기초하여 고정자(5)에 결합되는 적어도 하나의 냉각 요소(11a, 11b)에 의해 제어하는 온도 제어 방법에 있어서, 진공 펌프(2)에 의해 인출되는 전류 또는 소비되는 전력으로부터 선택된 펌핑 부하를 나타내는 파라미터의 값이 부하 문턱값 미만인지 여부 및, 펌핑 부하를 나타내는 파라미터의 값이 그 부하 문턱값 미만이라면, 온도 설정치가 증가되었는지 여부를 모니터링하는 것을 특징으로 한다. 본 발명은 또한, 건식 진공 펌프 형식의 진공 펌프 및 설비에 관한 것이다.

column12: Dispositif, procédé de surveillance de dépôts et pompe à vide
column13: Dispositif de surveillance (1) de dépôts dans un conduit de refoulement (9) caractérisé en ce qu’il comporte :- un capteur de pression (10) permettant de mesurer au moins une différence de pression dans le conduit de refoulement (9) entre une pression amont dans un emplacement amont (11) et une pression aval dans un emplacement aval (12) dans la direction de pompage des gaz (F), et - une unité de traitement (14) configurée pour déterminer la présence de dépôt entre les emplacements amont et aval (11, 12) en fonction de la comparaison de la différence de pression mesurée avec au moins un seuil prédéterminé. Figure d’abrégé : Figure 1

column12: Method for controlling the temperature of a vacuum pump, and associated vacuum pump and installation
column13: The invention relates to a method for controlling the temperature of a vacuum pump (2) of the dry vacuum pump type subjected to variable pumping loads, in which the temperature of the vacuum pump ( 2) is controlled by means of the at least one cooling element (11a, 11b) coupled to the stator (5) on the basis of a temperature setpoint and of a measurement of the temperature of the stator (5), characterized in that monitoring monitors whether the value of a parameter indicative of the pumping load, chosen from either a current drawn or a power consumed by the vacuum pump (2), is below a load threshold and, if the value of the parameter indicative of the pumping load is below the load threshold, then the temperature setpoint is increased. The invention also relates to a vacuum pump of the dry vacuum pump type and to an installation.

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE TEMPERATURE OF A VACUUM PUMP, AND ASSOCIATED VACUUM PUMP AND INSTALLATION
column13: The invention relates to a method for controlling the temperature of a vacuum pump (2) of the dry type subjected to variable pumping loads, in which the temperature of the vacuum pump (2) is controlled by means of at least one cooling element (11a, 11b) coupled to the stator (5) according to a temperature setpoint and a measurement of the temperature of the stator (5), characterized in that the value of a parameter indicative of the pumping load and chosen from a current or a power drawn by the vacuum pump (2) is monitored to determine whether it is below a load threshold and, if the value of the parameter indicative of the pumping load is below the load threshold then the temperature setpoint is increased. The invention also relates to a vacuum pump of the dry type and to an installation.

column12: METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE TEMPERATURE OF A VACUUM PUMP, AND ASSOCIATED VACUUM PUMP AND INSTALLATION
Dry-type primary vacuum pump and method for controlling the injection of a purging gas
column13: The invention relates to a dry-type primary vacuum pump (1) comprising an injection device (9) configured to distribute a purging gas in the pumping stages (2a-2e), the injection device (9) comprising: o a first pressure sensor (12) arranged on a common portion (15) of the distributor (10), o a second pressure sensor (13a-13e) arranged on each branch (16a-16e) of the distributor (10), and o a control unit (14) configured to generate a pulse width modulation command signal for the control of the regulation valves (11a-11e) independently of one another as a function of the pressure measurement differences between the first pressure sensor (12) and the second pressure sensors (13a-13e).

column12: PROCEDE DE CONTROLE DE LA TEMPERATURE D’UNE POMPE A VIDE, POMPE A VIDE ET INSTALLATION ASSOCIEES
column13: L'invention concerne un procédé de contrôle de la température d'une pompe à vide (2) de type sèche soumise à des charges de pompage variables, dans lequel on contrôle la température de la pompe à vide (2) au moyen d'au moins un élément refroidisseur (11a, 11b) couplé au stator (5) en fonction d'une consigne de température et d'une mesure de la température du stator (5), caractérisé en ce qu'on surveille si la valeur d'un paramètre représentatif de la charge de pompage choisi parmi un courant consommé ou une puissance consommée par la pompe à vide (2) est inférieure à un seuil de charge et, si la valeur du paramètre représentatif de la charge de pompage est inférieure au seuil de charge alors on augmente la consigne de température. L'invention concerne également une pompe à vide de type sèche et une installation.

column12: 1ROUE POUR CYCLE DONT LES RAYONS SON2L'INTERMEDIAIRE D'UNE PIECE INDEPEN
Wheel for bicycles offering low wind resistance
column13: The cycle wheel comprises a rim (2) connected to a hub (3) by an inclined spoke assembly (4). The spokes are connected to the hub by a central retaining collar (36a,36b)which is independent of the hub body (25). The rods are located in a central zone of diameter smaller than the internal diameter (D) of the bearing casing. The central retaining collar consists of an external retaining collar fixed to an internal retaining collar. The lower end (12) of each spoke is held between the external and internal collars by pins (37). The internal collar is supported on the external ring of the hub bearings.

column12: DRY VACUUM PUMP
column13: Dry vacuum pump (1) having a cooling device (10) configured to cool the stator (2), the cooling device (10) having a fluidic circuit (11) and at least one flow rate regulator (12) arranged in a regulation duct (15) of the fluidic circuit (11), the flow rate regulator (12) having an orifice plate (17) traversed by an orifice (26), and a flexible membrane (20) having a central opening (14) which is smaller than said orifice (26), the flexible membrane (20) being positioned upstream of the orifice plate (17) in the flow direction of the cooling fluid (f2).

column12: Pompe à vide sèche
column13: Pompe à vide (1) sèche comportant un dispositif de refroidissement (10) configuré pour refroidir le stator (2), le dispositif de refroidissement (10) comportant un circuit fluidique (11) et au moins un régulateur de débit (12) agencé dans un conduit de régulation (15) du circuit fluidique (11), le régulateur de débit (12) comportant une plaque à orifice (17) traversée par un orifice (26), et une membrane flexible (20) ayant une ouverture centrale (14) plus petite que ledit orifice (26), la membrane flexible (20) étant positionnée en amont de la plaque à orifice (17) dans le sens d’écoulement du fluide de refroidissement (f2). Figure d’abrégé : figure 1

column12: POMPE A VIDE DE TYPE SECHE ET PROCEDE DE COMMANDE D'UN MOTEUR SYNCHRONE DE POMPE A VIDE
column13: L'invention concerne une pompe à vide (1 ; 30) de type sèche comportant : - deux arbres (6, 7) portant respectivement au moins un rotor de pompage (8), les rotors de pompage (8) étant configurés pour tourner de façon synchronisée en sens inverse pour entrainer un gaz à pomper depuis une aspiration (4) de la pompe à vide (1 ; 30) vers un refoulement (5), et - un moteur synchrone (9) configuré pour entrainer un des arbres (6, 7) en rotation, le moteur synchrone (9) comportant : - un rotor (10) accouplé à l'arbre (6), et - un premier stator (12) à enroulements (13) agencé autour du rotor (10), caractérisée en ce que le moteur synchrone (9) comporte au moins un deuxième stator (14) à enroulements (15) agencé autour dudit rotor (10), les enroulements (13, 15) des stators (12, 14) pouvant être alimentés individuellement ou simultanément pour adapter la puissance du moteur synchrone (9) à la charge de pompage. La présente invention concerne également un procédé de commande d'un moteur synchrone de pompe à vide.

column12: DRY VACUUM PUMP AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING A SYNCHRONOUS MOTOR OF A VACUUM PUMP
column13: A dry vacuum pump is provided, including two shafts, respectively supporting at least one pumping rotor being configured to synchronously rotate in reverse in order to convey a gas to be pumped from an intake of the dry vacuum pump to an outlet; and a synchronous motor configured to rotate one shaft of the two shafts, the synchronous motor including a rotor coupled to the shaft, a first stator with windings arranged around the rotor, and at least one second stator with windings arranged around the rotor, the windings of the stators being configured to be supplied individually or simultaneously in order to adapt a power of the synchronous motor to a pumping load. A method for controlling a synchronous motor of a vacuum pump is also provided.

column12: VACUUM PUMP OF DRY TYPE AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING A VACUUM PUMP SYNCHRONOUS MOTOR
column13: The disclosure relates to a vacuum pump (1; 30) of dry type comprising: • -two shafts (6, 7) respectively bearing at least one pump rotor (8), the pump rotors (8) being configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to carry a gas that is to be pumped from a suction inlet (4) of the vacuum pump (1; 30) towards an outlet (5), and • - a synchronous motor (9) configured to drive one of the shafts (6, 7) in rotation, the synchronous motor (9) comprising: • - a rotor (10) coupled to the shaft (6), and • - a first stator (12) with windings (13) which is arranged around the rotor (10), characterized in that the synchronous motor (9) comprises at least a second stator (14) with windings (15) which is arranged around said rotor (10), the windings (13, 15) of the stators (12, 14) being able to be powered individually or simultaneously so that the power of the synchronous motor (9) can be adapted to the pumping load. The present disclosure also relates to a method for controlling a vacuum pump synchronous motor. The disclosure relates to a vacuum pump (1; 30) of dry type comprising: • -two shafts (6, 7) respectively bearing at least one pump rotor (8), the pump rotors (8) being configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to carry a gas that is to be pumped from a suction inlet (4) of the vacuum pump (1; 30) towards an outlet (5), and • - a synchronous motor (9) configured to drive one of the shafts (6, 7) in rotation, the synchronous motor (9) comprising: • - a rotor (10) coupled to the shaft (6), and • - a first stator (12) with windings (13) which is arranged around the rotor (10), characterized in that the synchronous motor (9) comprises at least a second stator (14) with windings (15) which is arranged around said rotor (10), the windings (13, 15) of the stators (12, 14) being able to be powered individually or simultaneously so that the power of the synchronous motor (9) can be adapted to the pumping load. The present disclosure also relates to a method for controlling a vacuum pump synchronous motor.

column12: POMPE A VIDE DE TYPE SECHE ET PROCEDE DE COMMANDE D'UN MOTEUR SYNCHRONE DE POMPE A VIDE
column13: L'invention concerne une pompe à vide (1 ; 30) de type sèche comportant : - deux arbres (6, 7) portant respectivement au moins un rotor de pompage (8), les rotors de pompage (8) étant configurés pour tourner de façon synchronisée en sens inverse pour entrainer un gaz à pomper depuis une aspiration (4) de la pompe à vide (1 ; 30) vers un refoulement (5), et - un moteur synchrone (9) configuré pour entrainer un des arbres (6, 7) en rotation, le moteur synchrone (9) comportant : - un rotor (10) accouplé à l'arbre (6), et - un premier stator (12) à enroulements (13) agencé autour du rotor (10), caractérisée en ce que le moteur synchrone (9) comporte au moins un deuxième stator (14) à enroulements (15) agencé autour dudit rotor (10), les enroulements (13, 15) des stators (12, 14) pouvant être alimentés individuellement ou simultanément pour adapter la puissance du moteur synchrone (9) à la charge de pompage. La présente invention concerne également un procédé de commande d'un moteur synchrone de pompe à vide.

column12: Dry vacuum pump and method for controlling a synchronous motor of a vacuum pump
Dry vacuum pump and method for controlling a synchronous motor of a vacuum pump
column13: A dry vacuum pump is provided, including two shafts, respectively supporting at least one pumping rotor being configured to synchronously rotate in reverse in order to convey a gas to be pumped from an intake of the dry vacuum pump to an outlet; and a synchronous motor configured to rotate one shaft of the two shafts, the synchronous motor including a rotor coupled to the shaft, a first stator with windings arranged around the rotor, and at least one second stator with windings arranged around the rotor, the windings of the stators being configured to be supplied individually or simultaneously in order to adapt a power of the synchronous motor to a pumping load. A method for controlling a synchronous motor of a vacuum pump is also provided.
column32: Combined Chinese Office Action and Search Report dated Jan. 29, 2022 in Chinese Patent Application No. 201880079549.0 (with English translation), 12 pages.;;International Search Report dated Apr. 9, 2019 in PCT/EP2018/083695 filed on Dec 5, 2018, 3 pages.;;Combined Taiwanese Office Action and Search Report dated Jul. 8, 2021 in Patent Application No. 107142409 (with English language translation), 10 pages.;;Japanese Office Action dated May 10, 2022, in corresponding Japanese Patent Application No. 2020-557381 (with English translation), 15 pages.

column12: VACUUM PUMP OF DRY TYPE AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING A VACUUM PUMP SYNCHRONOUS MOTOR
column13: The disclosure relates to a vacuum pump (1; 30) of dry type comprising: -two shafts (6, 7) respectively bearing at least one pump rotor (8), the pump rotors (8) being configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to carry a gas that is to be pumped from a suction inlet (4) of the vacuum pump (1; 30) towards an outlet (5), and -a synchronous motor (9) configured to drive one of the shafts (6, 7) in rotation, the synchronous motor (9) comprising: -a rotor (10) coupled to the shaft (6), and -a first stator (12) with windings (13) which is arranged around the rotor (10), characterizedin that the synchronous motor (9) comprises at least a second stator (14) with windings (15) which is arranged around said rotor (10), the windings (13, 15) of the stators (12, 14) being able to be powered individually or simultaneously so that the power of the synchronous motor (9) can be adapted to the pumping load. The present disclosure also relates to a method for controlling a vacuum pump synchronous motor. The disclosure relates to a vacuum pump (1; 30) of dry type comprising: -two shafts (6, 7) respectively bearing at least one pump rotor (8), the pump rotors (8) being configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to carry a gas that is to be pumped from a suction inlet (4) of the vacuum pump (1; 30) towards an outlet (5), and -a synchronous motor (9) configured to drive one of the shafts (6, 7) in rotation, the synchronous motor (9) comprising: -a rotor (10) coupled to the shaft (6), and -a first stator (12) with windings (13) which is arranged around the rotor (10), characterized in that the synchronous motor (9) comprises at least a second stator (14) with windings (15) which is arranged around said rotor (10), the windings (13, 15) of the stators (12, 14) being able to be powered individually or simultaneously so that the power of the synchronous motor (9) can be adapted to the pumping load. The present disclosure also relates to a method for controllinga vacuum pump synchronous motor.

column12: Dry vacuum pump and method for controlling a synchronous motor of a vacuum pump
column13: The invention relates to a dry vacuum pump (1; 30) comprising: - two shafts (6, 7) respectively supporting at least one pumping rotor (8), the pumping rotors (8) being configured to synchronously rotate in reverse in order to convey a gas to be pumped from an intake (4) of the vacuum pump (1; 30) to an outlet (5); and - a synchronous motor (9) configured to rotate one of the shafts (6, 7), the synchronous motor (9) comprising: - a rotor (10) coupled to the shaft (6); and - a first stator (12) with windings (13) arranged around the rotor (10), characterized in that the synchronous motor (9) comprises at least one second stator (14) with windings (15) arranged around said rotor (10), the windings (13, 15) of the stators (12, 14) being able to be supplied individually or simultaneously in order to adapt the power of the synchronous motor (9) to the pumping load. The present invention also relates to a method for controlling a synchronous motor of a vacuum pump.

column12: VACUUM PUMP OF DRY TYPE AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING A VACUUM PUMP SYNCHRONOUS MOTOR
건식 진공 펌프 및 진공 펌프 동기식 모터를 제어하는 방법
column13: 본 개시는, 건식 진공 펌프(1; 30)에 관한 것으로: - 개별적으로 적어도 하나의 펌핑 로터(8)를 지지하는 2개의 샤프트(6, 7)로서, 상기 펌핑 로터들(8)은, 펌핑될 기체를 진공 펌프(1; 30)의 흡입구(4)로부터 배출구(5)로 이송하기 위해 서로 반대로 동기식으로 회전하도록 구성되는 것인, 2개의 샤프트(6, 7); 및 - 상기 샤프트들(6, 7) 중의 하나를 회전시키도록 구성되는 동기식 모터(9)로서, - 상기 샤프트(6)에 커플링되는 로터(10); 및 - 상기 로터(10) 둘레에 배열되는 권선들(13)을 갖는 제1 스테이터(12)를 포함하는 것인, 동기식 모터(9)를 포함하고, 상기 동기식 모터(9)는, 상기 로터(10) 둘레에 배열되는 권선들(15)을 갖는 적어도 하나의 제2 스테이터(14)를 포함하고, 상기 스테이터들(12, 14)의 상기 권선들(13, 15)들은, 동기식 모터(9)의 동력을 펌핑 부하에 맞추기 위해 개별적으로 또는 동시에 공급받을 수 있는 것을 특징으로 하는 건식 진공 펌프(1; 30)에 관한 것이다. 본 개시는 또한, 진공 펌프의 동기식 모터를 제어하는 방법에 관한 것이다.

column12: PUMPING UNIT
column13: The invention relates to a pumping unit comprising a primary vacuum pump; a Roots-type vacuum pump (3) comprising a pumping stage (7) having a stator (9) inside of which two Roots rotors (5) are configured to rotate synchronously in the opposite directions in order to drive a gas to be pumped between an inlet port (10) and an outlet port (11); a line (13) connecting the outlet port (11) to a suction port (12) of the primary vacuum pump (2), and characterised in that the smallest distance (d) between one edge of the outlet port (11) and each of the rotors (5) in the pumping stage (7) is at least less than three centimetres.

column12: PUMPING UNIT
Pumping unit including a rough vacuum pump and a roots vacuum pump
column13: A pumping system is provided, including a rough-vacuum pump; a Roots vacuum pump including a pumping stage having a stator inside which two Roots rotors are configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to drive a gas to be pumped between an inlet orifice and an outlet orifice; and a pipeline connecting the outlet orifice to an intake of the rough-vacuum pump, a shortest distance between an edge of the outlet orifice and each of the Roots rotors in the pumping stage being less than 3 cm, and the outlet orifice being situated at the end of an upstream tube of the pipeline that passes into the pumping stage.
column32: International Search Report dated Apr. 3, 2020 in PCT/EP2019/081556 filed Nov. 15, 2019, 4 pages.

column12: Pumping unit
column13: The invention relates to a pumping unit having: - a rough-vacuum pump, - a Roots vacuum pump (3) comprising a pumping stage (7) having a stator (9) inside which two Roots rotors (5) are configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to drive a gas to be pumped between an inlet orifice (10) and an outlet orifice (11), - a pipeline (13) connecting the outlet orifice (11) to an intake (12) of the rough-vacuum pump (2), characterized in that the shortest distance (d) between an edge of the outlet orifice (11) and each of the rotors (5) in the pumping stage (7) is at least less than three centimetres.

column12: PUMPING UNIT
column13: A pumping system is provided, including a rough-vacuum pump; a Roots vacuum pump including a pumping stage having a stator inside which two Roots rotors are configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions to drive a gas to be pumped between an inlet orifice and an outlet orifice; and a pipeline connecting the outlet orifice to an intake of the rough-vacuum pump, a shortest distance between an edge of the outlet orifice and each of the Roots rotors in the pumping stage being less than 3 cm, and the outlet orifice being situated at the end of an upstream tube of the pipeline that passes into the pumping stage.

column12: Groupe de pompage
column13: Groupe de pompage L’invention concerne un groupe de pompage comportant : une pompe à vide primaire, une pompe à vide de type Roots (3) comprenant un étage de pompage (7) ayant un stator (9) à l’intérieur duquel deux rotors (5) Roots sont configurés pour tourner de façon synchronisée en sens inverse pour entrainer un gaz à pomper entre un orifice d’entrée (10) et un orifice de sortie (11), une canalisation (13) reliant l’orifice de sortie (11) à une aspiration (12) de la pompe à vide primaire (2), caractérisé en ce que la plus petite distance (d) entre une bordure de l’orifice de sortie (11) et chacun des rotors (5) dans l’étage de pompage (7) est au moins inférieure à trois centimètres. FIGURE : 2

column12: 펌핑 유닛
column13: 본 발명은 펌핑 유닛에 관한 것으로, 이 펌핑 유닛은, 저진공 펌프(2)와, 스테이터(9)를 구비한 펌핑 스테이지(7)를 포함하는 루츠 진공 펌프(3)로서 스테이터의 내부에서 2개의 루츠 로터(5)가 서로 반대 방향으로 동기하여 회전하여 펌핑 대상 가스를 입구 오리피스(10)와 출구 오리피스(11) 사이에서 구동하도록 구성되는 것인 루츠 진공 펌프(3)와, 상기 출구 오리피스(11)를 상기 저진공 펌프(2)의 흡입구(12)에 연결하는 파이프 라인(13) 을 포함하며, 상기 펌핑 스테이지(7) 내에서 상기 출구 오리피스(11)의 에지와 각각의 로터(5) 사이의 최단 거리(d)는 적어도 3 ㎝ 미만인 것을 특징으로 한다.

column12: Groupe de pompage
column13: Groupe de pompage L’invention concerne un groupe de pompage comportant : une pompe à vide primaire, une pompe à vide de type Roots (3) comprenant un étage de pompage (7) ayant un stator (9) à l’intérieur duquel deux rotors (5) Roots sont configurés pour tourner de façon synchronisée en sens inverse pour entrainer un gaz à pomper entre un orifice d’entrée (10) et un orifice de sortie (11), une canalisation (13) reliant l’orifice de sortie (11) à une aspiration (12) de la pompe à vide primaire (2), caractérisé en ce que la plus petite distance (d) entre une bordure de l’orifice de sortie (11) et chacun des rotors (5) dans l’étage de pompage (7) est au moins inférieure à trois centimètres. FIGURE : 2

column12: PUMPING UNIT
PUMPING UNIT
column13: The invention relates to a pumping unit comprising: - a primary vacuum pump, - a Roots-type vacuum pump (3) comprising a pumping stage (7) having a stator (9) inside of which two Roots rotors (5) are configured to rotate synchronously in opposite directions in order to drive a gas to be pumped between an inlet port (10) and an outlet port (11), - a line (13) connecting the outlet port (11) to a suction port (12) of the primary vacuum pump (2), characterised in that the smallest distance (d) between one edge of the outlet port (11) and each of the rotors (5) in the pumping stage (7) is at least less than three centimetres.

column12: ROUGH-VACUUM PUMP OF DRY TYPE
column13: A rough-vacuum pump of dry type includes a duct formed in the stator and of which an inlet orifice is intended to be connected to at least one source of purge gas and of which at least one outlet orifice communicates with the last pumping stage communicating with the delivery and a device for injecting a heated purge gas including a heating device to at least partly heat the purge gas injected into the duct to a temperature higher than 40° C.

column12: Rough-vacuum pump of dry type
column13: The invention relates to a rough-vacuum pump (1) of dry type, comprising a duct formed in the stator (2) and of which an inlet orifice is intended to be connected to at least one source of purge gas and of which at least one outlet orifice communicates with the last pumping stage (3e) communicating with the delivery (5) and a device for injecting a heated purge gas (15) comprising a heating device (24) configured to at least partly heat the purge gas injected into the duct to a temperature higher than 40 DEG C.

column13: Primary dry-type vacuum pump (1) comprising a duct formed in the stator (2), an inlet of which is intended to be connected to at least one source of purge gas and of which at least one outlet communicates with the last pumping stage (3e) communicating with the discharge (5) and a device for injecting a heated purge gas (15) comprising a heating device (24) configured to at least partially heat the purge gas injected into the duct at a temperature above 40°C.

column12: Pompe à vide primaire de type sèche
column13: L’invention concerne une pompe à vide (1) primaire de type sèche comportant un conduit formé dans le stator (2) dont un orifice d’entrée est destiné à être relié à au moins une source de gaz de purge et dont au moins un orifice de sortie communique avec le dernier étage de pompage (3e) communiquant avec le refoulement (5) et un dispositif d’injection d’un gaz de purge chauffé (15) comportant un dispositif de chauffage (24) configuré pour chauffer au moins en partie le gaz de purge injecté dans le conduit à une température supérieure à 40°C. column13: L’invention concerne une pompe à vide (1) primaire de type sèche comportant un conduit formé dans le stator (2) dont un orifice d’entrée est destiné à être relié à au moins une source de gaz de purge et dont au moins un orifice de sortie communique avec le dernier étage de pompage (3e) communiquant avec le refoulement (5) et un dispositif d’injection d’un gaz de purge chauffé (15) comportant un dispositif de chauffage (24) configuré pour chauffer au moins en partie le gaz de purge injecté dans le conduit à une température supérieure à 40°C. column12: PRIMARY DRY-TYPE VACUUM PUMP
column13: The invention relates to primary dry-type vacuum pump (1) comprising a duct formed in the stator (2), an inlet of the duct is intended to be connected to at least one source of purge gas, and at least one outlet of the duct communicates with the last pumping stage (3e) communicating with the discharge (5). The primary dry-type vacuum pump further comprises a device for injecting a heated purge gas (15) comprising a heating device (24) configured to at least partially heat the purge gas injected into the duct at a temperature above 40 DEG C.
column15: DECORDE PAUL;;DENGREVILLE ANTOINE;;GODINAT PIERRICK;;GRENIER YANNICK;;NEEL THIERRY;;LEMARQUAND YANN

column12: 건식 저진공 펌프
column13: 본 발명은, 고정자(2)에 형성되며 유입구 오리피스가 적어도 하나의 퍼지 가스 공급원에 연결되도록 의도되며 적어도 하나의 유출구 오리피스가 전달부(5)와 연통하는 마지막 펌핑 스테이지(3e)와 연통하는 것인 덕트 및 이 덕트에 주입된 퍼지 가스를 40℃보다 높은 온도로 적어도 부분적으로 가열하도록 구성된 가열 장치(24)를 포함하는, 가열된 퍼지 가스를 주입하기 위한 장치(15)를 포함하는 건식 저진공 펌프(1)에 관한 것이다.
column15: DECORDE PAUL;;DENGREVILLE ANTOINE;;GODINAT PIERRICK;;GRENIER YANNICK;;NEEL THIERRY;;LEMARQUAND YANN
